unnormalised: Entertainment: OMG! Are Ranbir & Alia on the Rocks?
normalised: Entertainment: O M G! Are Ranbir and Alia on the Rocks?

unnormalised: Bollywood’s power couple, Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt, have fans buzzing! Rumours are swirling faster than chai at a Mumbai local station, with whispers of trouble in paradise. Sources close to the couple claim they haven't been spotted together much lately, fueling speculation.
normalised: Bollywood’s power couple, Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt, have fans buzzing! Rumours are swirling faster than chai at a Mumbai local station, with whispers of trouble in paradise. Sources close to the couple claim they haven't been spotted together much lately, fueling speculation.

unnormalised: Remember that lavish Diwali party at the Ambani’s Antilia on 24/10/2024? Alia arrived solo, looking a bit…strained. And Ranbir was MIA! Hmmm...
normalised: Remember that lavish Diwali party at the Ambani’s Antilia on twenty fourth October two thousand and twenty four? Alia arrived solo, looking a bit…strained. And Ranbir was M I A! Hmmm...

unnormalised: Adding fuel to the fire, insiders report Ranbir’s been spending late nights at his Bandra bachelor pad, allegedly jamming with director Ayan Mukerji until 02:30 AM. Alia, meanwhile, was spotted at a Manish Malhotra fitting on 27/10/2024, looking less than thrilled.
normalised: Adding fuel to the fire, insiders report Ranbir’s been spending late nights at his Bandra bachelor pad, allegedly jamming with director Ayan Mukerji until two thirty A M. Alia, meanwhile, was spotted at a Manish Malhotra fitting on twenty seventh October two thousand and twenty four, looking less than thrilled.

unnormalised: Could this be just a busy work schedule or is there more to it? Their publicists haven't commented yet, but gossip mills are working overtime. Guess we'll have to wait and see if the couple address these rumours before the big Christmas party on 25/12/2024. Keep those ears peeled, folks! This could get interesting!
